mvc

Class FileManagerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • mvc.FileManagerModel

  • public class FileManagerModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The main Model class. following MVC design, this class holds data to be accessed by the controller and displayed by the view

        public void updateInternalFileSystem(Node node)

        Parameters:
        node - the root node of the tree on which to perform the update
